| **Job Title** | Operations Manager | **Department:** | Operations |
| **Incumbent** |  | **Reports to:** | Director |
| **Date** |  |  |  |

Position Overview

* Assume overall responsibility for the Purchasing (Raw Materials),Quality, Production and Engineering functions of Kangopak
* Acts as Deputy for BRCGS Compliance Officer in BRCGS Compliance Officer’s absence
* Acts as Deputy for Director in Director’s absence
* Acts as Deputy for Admin Manager in Admin Manager’s absence
* Acts as Deputy for Team Leaders in their absence
* Member of the Risk Team

Essential Job Functions

* Source and procure laminated substrates according to Kangopak specifications timeously, at the best price, shortest lead time and best quality
* Recruit, train and manage all Operational Staff.
* Draw up and implement maintenance schedules for all Plant and Equipment
* Schedule production in accordance with Customer requirements and efficient manufacturing methods
* Compliance with OHS Act
* Compliance with requirements of BRCGS (Product Safety and Quality Management system).

Requirements

* B Com Degree
* Exposure to Flexible Packaging environment

Other Skills/Abilities

* Self-starter with Initiative
* Proficient in PASTEL
* Computer literacy
* Knowledge of World Class Manufacturing techniques
